origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'MusicIndustry.get_structure', 'description': 'Get the structure of a music industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The music industry to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'structure', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the industry structure.'}]}, {'name': 'MusicIndustry.get_profit_models', 'description': 'Get the profit models of different segments in the music industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The music industry to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'profit_models', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing profit models.'}]}, {'name': 'MusicIndustry.get_case_studies', 'description': 'Get case studies of collaborations in the music industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The music industry to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing case studies.'}]}, {'name': 'MusicIndustry.get_optimization_suggestions', 'description': 'Get optimization suggestions for the music industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The music industry to analyze.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'suggestions', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing optimization suggestions.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取K-pop音乐产业的结构。接下来，获取K-pop音乐产业各环节的盈利模式。然后，获取K-pop音乐产业上下游企业的合作案例。最后，获取K-pop音乐产业的优化建议，并获取潜在的发展机遇。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'industry'的值是什么?
